attributes.action: Inciting violence and hatred in Pakistan by Altaf Hussain
attributes.additional_details: Altaf Hussain is spreading hatred as a British citizen in the metropolis of Karachi. He has issued blatant death threats against peaceful protestors and has been implicated as the main benefactor of extortion campaign run by his party the MQM. As a British Citizen he should not be allowed to a) promote violence and hatred over the Internet or via telephone communications b) be the benefactor of money of corrupt means from a country which is the recipient of British development funds.
